title: EU delays tariffs as focus of Trump global trade war shifts to China
shortDescription: Financial markets around the world soared Thursday amid hope the global trade war might be easing after President Trump's 90-day pause on tariffs.

title: Judges block Trump's deportations that used 1798 Alien Enemies Act
shortDescription: Wednesday's U.S. District Court rulings in Texas and New York apply only to migrants still in the United States.

title: Trump lauds Whitmer, potential 2028 Democratic presidential candidate
shortDescription: Whitmer visited the White House to advocate for a pair of issues important to her state. The visit had broader political overtones, though.

title: GOP holdouts force delay on vote to advance Trump's legislative agenda
shortDescription: Conservative members are concerned the package will not do enough to reduce the federal deficit.

title: House Republicans approve bill limiting the reach of federal judges
shortDescription: Republicans have taken up Trump's demand to limit the power of judges after the president faced several preliminary losses to begin his second term.

title: Trump orders probe of former cyber chief over 2020 election
shortDescription: Democrats blasted Trump's targeting of Chris Krebs and Miles Taylor, top officials in his first administration, as 'weaponizing' the government.

title: Trump's trade representative grilled by committee
shortDescription: "WTF who's in charge?" President Trump's trade representative Jamieson Greer faced tough questions on trade and tariff policy from a House committee.

title: GOP nervous about potential political blowback from Trump tariffs
shortDescription: Senators from Ted Cruz to Rand Paul and Thom Tillis are issuing warnings about the political ramifications if Trump's tariff gambit harms the economy.

title: What to know as Trump pauses most tariffs and stocks soar
shortDescription: Trump's pause on higher tariffs marked a dramatic reversal, sending the stock market soaring. Here's what to know about Trump's tariff rollercoaster.

title: Latino Dems want to visit notorious Salvadoran prison
shortDescription: U.S. Rep. Adriano Espaillat, D-N.Y., said Kilmar Abrego Garcia's family hasn't heard from him in over three weeks.

title: Trump speaks on his recent shift on tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump addressed his announcement of a 90-day pause on global reciprocal tariffs, but Democrats say it's due to pressure.

title: Trump pauses global reciprocal tariffs, raises China's
shortDescription: Treasury secretary Scott Bessent backed President Donald Trump's pausing of reciprocal tariffs for 90-days while raising China's levy.

title: SCOTUS allows Trump to fire labor regulators for now
shortDescription: The Supreme Court is letting Donald Trump's firing of Democratic members of independent labor boards remain in place as litigation continues.

title: Trump White House to appeal ruling lifting AP access restrictions
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's White House intends to appeal a judge's ruling lifting access restrictions on the Associated Press, which it imposed after the news agency continued referring to the Gulf of Mexico in its coverage, a court filing on Wednesday showed.

title: Trump pauses targeted tariffs for 90 days but hikes levies on China
shortDescription: Escalating the U.S. trade war with China, Trump said he was raising the tariffs for the country from 104% to 125%.

title: Judge orders Trump White House to restore access to AP
shortDescription: A U.S. judge has ordered President Donald Trump’s White House to lift access restrictions imposed on the Associated Press over the news agency's decision to continue to refer to the Gulf of Mexico in its coverage.

title: Appeals court clears way for Trump to fire federal workers
shortDescription: The ruling overturns a lower court that reinstated thousands of employees who lost their jobs in Trump's purge of the federal workforce.

title: Trump tells Americans 'BE COOL!' as China, EU hit back with tariffs
shortDescription: President Trump told Americans to "BE COOL!" and his administration downplayed the consequences as China and EU hit back with tariffs on the US.

title: Trump sued by Democrat he removed from civil rights agency
shortDescription: The former member of the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission claims her firing by President Donald Trump was illegal.
